title: Nicknames for champions?
body:
Do you and your friends have nicknames for champions? I dont mean the obvious ones like "Rengo" either. I mean ones that have a story.

My friends and I call LeBlanc LeBoob. We call Maokai Makookoo. We call Sona boobs for obvious reasons. We call Shyvana Nicki Minaj because of dat ass in her splashart. Any weird things you call champion?

replies.body:
Not sure if those are nicknames, or if you just like saying boobs....
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/fry-not-sure.gif

> Not sure if those are nicknames, or if you just like saying boobs....

{{champion:92}}: "Ribven" because we don't like to spell. It also looks/sounds funny
{{champion:45}}: "Veegar" or "Angry little shit"
{{champion:107}}: Exclusively called "Kitty" or "Rengo". "Rengar" is not a word in our dictionary of names.
{{champion:75}}: Susan.
{{champion:35}}: Satan
{{champion:17}}: Satan's little helper (Basically; we hate Shaco more than Teemo.)
{{champion:7}}: Varies. The most common ones are "LeBaguette," "LeBlonk" or "LeBitch". The last one is most common. By far. 
{{champion:24}}: "JaxHax" usually pronounced childishly with "eh" sounds instead of "Ah" sounds.
Dragonslayer {{champion:67}}: Quinn (Explanation: She looks more like Quinn than Vayne.)
Wildfire {{champion:143}}: "Hooters" (Explanation: If you look at her chest, it looks like an owl. Try unseeing *that*.)

I could list up more that have been used among my circle of friends, but beyond the ones I already listed, I don't remember any special ones... It's usually just "Bitch" variants of their names. "Bitcharina," "Malzabitch" etc.
... Yes. Those usually come from the same person. Whom tends to get pretty angry easily. And is also the only one who uses them seriously.

{{champion:103}} Weeb magnet

{{champion:77}} Godyr or OHHH SHIT OHHH SHIT PULL OUT THE BLUE CARDS

I mean, honestly? The nicknames I'll use not in allchat?

I'm pretty sure there are a lot of nicknames and that a lot of people use them.
Just naming a few off the top of my head that my friends and I call them and often hear others call them it as well.

LaBitch - LeBlanc
Wardick - Warwick
Rengay - Rengar
The Cow - Alistar
Soraka - Sorka
I call Shen, SHENPAI :)
